Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Bellagio in Las Vegas (The Strip), you'll be minutes from Crystals at City Center and close to University of Nevada-Las Vegas. This 5-star resort is within close proximity of The Linq and High Roller.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and minibars. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Flat-screen televisions with premium TV channels are provided, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. Before a night out at the casino, the 5 outdoor swimming pools are a perfect way to relax and recharge. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the resort's dining establishments, which include 5 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink from a poolside bar or one of the 13 bars/lounges.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and express check-in. Event facilities at this resort consist of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms. Free valet parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a meal at one of the resort's dining establishments, which include 5 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink from a poolside bar or one of the 13 bars/lounges.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Crystals at City Center - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
The Linq - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
High Roller - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
The Auto Collections - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Sands Expo Convention Center - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Fashion Show Mall - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
National Atomic Testing Museum - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Desert Research Institute - 2.3 km / 1.5 mi
Thomas and Mack Center - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Orleans Arena - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
University of Nevada-Las Vegas - 2.8 km / 1.8 mi
Marjorie Barrick Museum - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Las Vegas Convention Center - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Bali Hai Golf Club - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Welcome to Fabulous Las Vegas Sign - 3.2 km / 2 mi

The preferred airport for Bellagio is Las Vegas, NV (LAS-McCarran Intl.) - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Bellagio is Las Vegas, NV (LAS-McCarran Intl.) - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property’s location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
A minimum mandatory hotel-imposed fee of at least $39.00 (plus applicable tax) per room, per day, will be charged and collected by the hotel at check-in or check-out. This fee is subject to change without prior notice. The information published here is to give the client an estimate of additional fees that they may be responsible for but is not a guarantee of the final amount due. For a detailed description of what is included in the mandatory fee, please see hotel policies.

Minimum self-parking fees and valet parking fees are charged by the hour per room, per vehicle. These fees are tiered by hourly increments and collected by the hotel at check in or check out. The fee amounts are subject to change without prior notice. The information published here is to give the client an estimate of additional fees they may be responsible for but not a guarantee of the final amount due.

The smoking deep cleaning fee at Bellagio Resort and Casino is $500+tax for rooms and $1000+tax for suites.These prices are subject to change without prior notification.

Essential Information:
Mandatory resort fee of approximately 41-50 USD per room perday to be paid directly to the hotel Applicable from 05/Mar/2018 to 31/Dec/9999
Please note: This hotel charges guests a daily Resort Fee of $35 plus tax per room, per night payable directly to hotel. Hotel requires a USD 130 per day deposit for credit cards or a USD 200 per day deposit for cash/debit cards. Max Length-of-Stay is 29 nights. Reservations over 29-nights will not be accepted. SELF PARKING RATES: The self-parking fee is $7 for vehicles parked over 1 hour to 2 hours and $12 for vehicles parked over 2 to 4 hours and $15 over 24 hours VALET PARKING RATES: The valet parking fee is $20 for the first 4 hours (no grace period) and $25 for over 4 hours to 24 hours Early check in is not charged in any of MGM properties, however, based on availability at the property discretion Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Room No: 1

Two pets weighing under 40 pounds combined are allowed at the property for an extra charge of USD 120 per night.,Parking is available at an additional charge. Kindly contact the property for more details.,In case of early departure, guests will be responsible for the full remaining amount (room rate and tax) of the reservation.,Parking fees
Valet:
0 to 2 hours: USD 21.00
2 - 4 hours: USD 24.00
4 - 24 hours: USD 30.00

Self Park:
0 - 1 hour: Complimentary
1 - 2 hours: USD 9.00
2 - 4 hours: USD 15.00
4 - 24 hours: USD 18.00,For any bookings that are made with 2 complimentary buffets promotion, it excludes dinner and is up to a USD 75 value.

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Note: *Miminum age for check in is 21 years old.* *There is a resort fee payable by guest.* *Name changes are not allowed.* *This hotel has a Maximum 14 night stay restriction.* *The hotel Pool open year round during days.* **At check in all guests will be required to present a Major Credit Card to cover applicable charges for room, tax and resort fees, as well as a incidental amount per day.** *Please be advised there is a fee for early departure.*
